pages.text: $(li)The Ender Golem is a big creature made of obsidian which guards the first levels of the $(l:patchouli:structures/ruined_citadel)Ruined Citadel$(/l).$(br)$(li)It will attack you with its physical strength trying to hitting you, making earthquakes or even generating void runes underground that will hurt you if they touch you.

pages.name: Ender Golem
pages.text: It drops the $(l:patchouli:weapons/void_core)Void Core$(/l) upon death.
